item.title: Binary Search Tree
item.description: Definition A binary search tree (BST) is a tree data structure in which nodes are arranged according to the following property.

item.title: Level Order Traversal Binary Tree
item.description: Definition Level Order traversal is a breath first transversal. The traversal starts at the root and explores all the nodes at the same depth prior to moving onto the next depth level.

item.title: Depth Order Traversals: Binary Tree
item.description: Tree Traversals (Preorder, Inorder and Postorder) From the root of a binary tree, traverse deeper before going laterally.

item.title: Binary Tree Terms
item.description: Binary Tree Terms A tree has a root and leaves.
